title: Chickpea soup with asparagus
ingredients: ['1 can chickpeas, about 400g, drained', '1 onion, coarsely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, chopped', '1 litre (1 3/4 pints) vegetable or chicken stock', '150g (5 1/2 oz) asparagus, trimmed and cut into bite-sized pieces', '170g (6 oz) soup pasta or rice-shaped pasta', 'salt and pepper', 'To garnish', 'fine strips of zest from 1 lemon', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, preferably flat-leaf', '1 lemon, cut into wedges, to serve']
